pkgmetadata.longdescription:
DragonEgg is a sys-devel/gcc plugin (dragonegg.so) that replaces gcc's optimizers and code generators with those from the LLVM project. It is a reimplementation of llvm-gcc that works with gcc-4.5 or later.
This ebuild (as opposed to sys-devel/dragonegg::gentoo) installs respective builds of dragonegg.so in the plugin subdirectories of one or more gcc installations. (FIXME: The previous sentence is terrible. Please rewrite it.)

use.flag: Give the plugin ability to load LLVM plugins
